reviewText:
The first DVD they sent had a scratch or something on it and it skipped a lot but I contacted the seller and they sent another one out right away. That is why I gave them 5 stars, they have great customer service and are willing to fix a problem if there is one.

As a movie it does not get better than this. I first saw it at the Chicago International Film Festival and my husband and I both immediately fell in love with it and we needed it on DVD so we could watch it again and again. It has one of the best messages about love and relationships I've ever seen.

This will forever be one of my favorite movies of all time.

Bottom line: I would recommend this movie and this seller to anyone and I do often.
Wonderful! my new favorite film of 2015!
